Features Deluxe Edition:


* Sacrified Secrets On Sakrifisiose hidden treasure: attire, weapons, figurehead and sails. Also in the package: a pair of golden swords, costume, portrait and title of treasure hunter, outfit, portrait, title, heirloom and emblem!
* Reward rogue Here you will find the German rapier, as well as portrait, title and emblem relic Pathfinder.
* A mysterious treasure pack contains a pair of gold blades, as well as costume, portrait and title of treasure hunter. In addition, you will find a bone helm and exclusive portrait, heirloom, title and emblem cartography.
* Reward rogue Here you will find the German rapier, as well as portrait, title and emblem relic Pathfinder.
* DLC "Avelina" Together with Avelino experiencing an amazing adventure, consisting of three tasks, and open the mysterious artifact of the first civilization.


Changlog v.1.01

* Added support for 4K monitors.
* "Reload" and "R" keys are now available in the settings menu control.
* Significant performance improvements in the multiplayer.
* Better support for multiprocessing.
* Improved support for multiple monitors.
* Corrected an error rendering and optimization.
* Fixed various minor issues UI.
* Fixed various minor problems entrance.
* Fixed various minor hang-up.
